m_szDocTitle: Medical tele-robotic system with a master remote station with an arbitrator - WANG YULUN
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Medical tele-robotic system with a master remote station with an arbitrator United States Patent 8515577 Abstract: A robotic system that includes a mobile robot linked to a plurality of remote stations. One of the remote stations includes an arbitrator that controls access to the robot. Each remote station may be assigned a priority that is used by the arbitrator to determine which station has access to the robot. The arbitrator may include notification and call back mechanisms for sending messages relating to an access request and a granting of access for a re
